00059 class F3_MailformPlusPlus_Controller_Listing extends F3_MailformPlusPlus_AbstractController {
00060 
00067         protected $componentManager;
00068 
00075         protected $configuration;
00076 
00083         protected $templateFile;
00084 
00085         //not used
00086         protected $piVars;
00087 
00096         public function __construct(F3_GimmeFive_Component_Manager $componentManager, F3_MailformPlusPlus_Configuration $configuration) {
00097                 $this->componentManager = $componentManager;
00098                 $this->configuration = $configuration;
00099                 $this->initializeController();
00100         }
00101 
00109         public function setTemplateFile($template) {
00110                 $this->templateFile = $template;
00111         }
00112 
00119         public function process() {
00120                 $this->gp = t3lib_div::_GP('mailformplusplus');
00121 
00122                 //read settings
00123                 $settings = $this->configuration->getSettings();
00124                 if(!$settings['fe_listing.']) {
00125                         throw new Exception('no_config','F3_MailformPlusPlus_Controller_Listing');
00126                 }
00127                 $settings = $settings['fe_listing.'];
00128 
00129                 //read table
00130                 $table = $settings['table'];
00131 
00132                 if($this->gp['deleteId']) {
00133                         $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_DELETEquery($table,"uid=".$this->gp['deleteId']);
00134                 }
00135 
00136                 //set pid field
00137                 $pidField = "pid";
00138                 if($settings['pidField']) {
00139                         $pidField = $settings['pidField'];
00140                 }
00141                 $pids = t3lib_div::trimExplode(",",$settings['pid']);
00142 
00143                 //parse mapping
00144                 $this->getMapping($settings);
00145 
00146                 //set template file
00147                 $templateFile = $settings['templateFile'];
00148                 if(isset($settings['templateFile.']) && is_array($settings['templateFile.'])) {
00149                         $this->templateFile = $this->cObj->cObjGetSingle($settings['templateFile'],$settings['templateFile.']);
00150                 } else {
00151                         $this->templateFile = t3lib_div::getURL(F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::resolvePath($templateFile));
00152                 }
00153 
00154                 if(!$table || !$this->mapping) {
00155                         throw new Exception('insufficient_config','F3_MailformPlusPlus_Controller_Listing');
00156                 }
00157 
00158                 //set view
00159                 $viewClass = $settings['view'];
00160                 if(!$viewClass) {
00161                         $viewClass = "F3_MailformPlusPlus_View_Listing";
00162                 }
00163                 $viewClass = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::prepareClassName($viewClass);
00164 
00165                 $view = $this->componentManager->getComponent($viewClass);
00166 
00167                 if($this->gp['detailId']) {
00168                         $view->setTemplate($this->templateFile, 'DETAIL');
00169                 } else {
00170                         $view->setTemplate($this->templateFile, 'LIST');
00171                 }
00172 
00173 
00174                 //build WHERE clause
00175                 if($pids) {
00176                         $where = $pidField." IN (".implode(",",$pids).")";
00177                 }
00178 
00179                 //set ORDER BY
00180                 $orderby = $settings['orderby'];
00181 
00182                 //Select records
00183                 $res = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_SELECTquery("uid,".implode(",",array_keys($this->mapping)),$table,$where,'',$orderby);
00184 
00185                 //buid items array
00186                 $listItems = array();
00187                 if($res && $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_num_rows($res) > 0) {
00188                         while($row = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_fetch_assoc($res)) {
00189                                 if(!$this->gp['detailId']) {
00190                                         array_push($listItems,$row);
00191                                 } elseif($row['uid'] == $this->gp['detailId']) {
00192                                         array_push($listItems,$row);
00193                                 }
00194                         }
00195                 }
00196 
00197                 $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_free_result($res);
00198 
00199                 //render view
00200                 $view->setModel($listItems);
00201                 return $view->render(array(),array());
00202 
00203 
00204         }
00205 
00213         protected function getMapping(&$settings) {
00214                 if(!is_array($settings['mapping.'])) {
00215                         return array();
00216                 }
00217                 $mapping = array();
00218                 foreach($settings['mapping.'] as $dbfield=>$formfield) {
00219                         $mapping[$dbfield] = $formfield;
00220                 }
00221                 $this->mapping = $mapping;
00222         }
00223 
00230         protected function initializeController($value='') {
00231                 $this->piVars = t3lib_div::GParrayMerged($this->configuration->getPrefixedPackageKey());
00232         }
00233 
00234 }
